    • goToExit

      public void goToExit​(int sideX, int sideY, int numberOfDiamondsNeeded)
      The goToExit method. Check if the player goes on an exitDoor.
      Parameters:
      sideX - the x side on which the player moves
      sideY - the y side on which the player moves
      numberOfDiamondsNeeded - the number of diamonds necessary to go the next level, stored in the database
